actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for retirement after 30 years of actual civil service time, at any age.

summary.text: Authorizes Federal civil service annuities to employees after thirty years of actual civil service time, at any age, with specified limitations upon the number of years of military service which may be credited for purposes of this Act. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8336)

titles.title: A bill to provide for retirement after 30 years of actual civil service time, at any age.
